name: SolidMusic Bot
description: Open Source bot to stream media trough Telegram Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls and Pyrogram

API_ID.description: Fill it with your API_ID, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Fill it with your API_HASH, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Fill it with your Bot token, get it from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Fill it with your telegram id, not api id

SESSION.description: Fill it with your assistant session string

SUPPORT.description: your group support link, can use private or public group, example https://t.me/solidprojects_chat

CHANNEL.description: your channel support link, can use private or public channel, example https://t.me/solidprojects

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: fill it if you fork from original repo
